content.text:
[@daan2](@Bk5uzkFxdMJnJR+rKVd+X4LO/u+8VV+lA14e+XLabXQ=.ed25519) 

Oh, I bet that's coming from [this file](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-config/blob/ff36c6bb6c513166186f0db3d4bd98ad655ec1ef/defaults.js), where we're doing:

```js
host: config.host || nonPrivate.v4 || '::'
```

Maybe we should just rip that `nonPrivate.v4` bit out? I think we want to default to `::` anyway, the only exception is probably [on Windows](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-config/issues/35)?
